paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted genetic variant information for the TTR gene, including penetrance data for carriers.

patients.demographics: median age at onset 65 years, 7 males
patients.phenotype: neurological dysfunction followed by cardiac symptoms

individual_records.evidence_sentence: 72.7% (8/11 cases) of patients carrying the Ala97Ser presented with evidence of heart failure at confirmed diagnosis of ATTRv cardiac amyloidosis.

functional_data.summary: The Ala97Ser variant is associated with a mixed phenotype of neurological and cardiac symptoms.

variants.segregation_data: The variant segregates with disease in families, as evidenced by pedigree analysis.
variants.additional_notes: The Ala97Ser variant was the most common mutation found in this cohort.
key_quotes: The predominant genotypes identified in ATTR-CA were the Ala97Ser (p.Ala117Ser) mutation (11/29, 37.9%)

functional_data.summary: The Thr59Lys variant is associated with a mixed phenotype.

variants.segregation_data: The variant segregates with disease in families.
variants.additional_notes: The Thr59Lys variant was the second most common mutation found in this cohort.

tables_processed.table_caption: Genotype distribution in probands and family members.

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant data was extracted from the main text and tables.
